headline: Equifax Redesigns U.S. Consumer Credit Report to Help Consumers More Easily Monitor Financial Health
summary: Equifax速 (NYSE: EFX) is making it even easier for U.S. consumers to understand their credit history and monitor their financial health with the introduction of a new, reimagined consumer credit report design. Available now to U.S. consumers who request hard copies of their Equifax credit report, the new industry leading credit report enables people to more easily view their current VantageScore速 3.0 credit score and provides easy-to-read graphics for a comprehensive view of current and past cred
